title: Writings From Prison - Bobby Sands (Kindle)
description:
These are the collected writings of Bobby Sands, IRA volunteer and Irish republican prisoner. 

Sands's writings span the last four years of his life in the H-Blocks of Long Kesh prison in Northern Ireland. They were mostly written on pieces of toilet tissue or cigarette paper with the refill of a ballpoint pen that he kept hidden inside his body. 

Sands died in 1981 after 66 days on hunger strike against the imposition of criminal status on Irish republican prisoners.
